RawDataReader Class Reference

This class loads a raw data file into memory, processes data structures with information about the measurement, and loops over the events. More...

Detailed Description

This class loads a raw data file into memory, processes data structures with information about the measurement, and loops over the events.

void RawDataReader::ReadMeasInfo ( MseMeasInfoX &  mseMeasInfo  ) 

This method is supposed to read all information about the measurement from raw data.

It does not read events.
